verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> bish-Nat year שָׁל֔וֹשׁ <WH7969> sha-Loosh, In the third לְמַלְכ֖וּת <WH4438> le-mal-Chut of the reign בֵּלְאשַׁצַּ֣ר <WH1112> be-le-shatz-Tzar Belshazzar הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech; of king חָז֞וֹן <WH2377> cha-Zon a vision נִרְאָ֤ה <WH7200> nir-'Ah appeared אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni to me דָנִיֵּ֔אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel, unto me [even unto] me Daniel אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after הַנִּרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> han-nir-'Ah that which appeared אֵלַ֖י <WH413> 'e-Lai to me בַּתְּחִלָּֽה׃ <WH8462> bat-te-chil-Lah. unto me at the first

וָֽאֶרְאֶה֮ <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh And I saw בֶּחָזוֹן֒ <WH2377> be-cha-zOn in a vision וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> vay-Hi become בִּרְאֹתִ֔י <WH7200> bir-'o-Ti, and it came to pass when I saw וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> va-'a-Ni myself בְּשׁוּשַׁ֣ן <WH7800> be-shu-Shan that I [was] at Shushan הַבִּירָ֔ה <WH1002> hab-bi-Rah, [in] the palace אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which בְּעֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> be-'ei-Lam of Elam הַמְּדִינָ֑ה <WH4082> ham-me-di-Nah; which [is] in the province וָאֶרְאֶה֙ <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh and I saw בֶּֽחָז֔וֹן <WH2377> be-cha-Zon, in a vision וַאֲנִ֥י <WH589> va-'a-Ni myself הָיִ֖יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti become עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- was beside אוּבַ֥ל <WH180> 'u-Val and I was by the river אוּלָֽי׃ <WH195> 'u-Lai. of Ulai

וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> va-'es-Sa Then I lifted up עֵינַי֙ <WH5869> 'ei-Nai mine eyes וָאֶרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> va-'er-'Eh, and saw וְהִנֵּ֣ה׀ <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold אַ֣יִל <WH352> 'A-yil ram אֶחָ֗ד <WH259> 'e-Chad, a עֹמֵ֛ד <WH5975> 'o-Med and behold there stood לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאֻבָ֖ל <WH180> ha-'u-Val the river וְל֣וֹ ve-Lo קְרָנָ֑יִם <WH7161> ke-ra-Na-yim; which had [two] horns וְהַקְּרָנַ֣יִם <WH7161> ve-hak-ke-ra-Na-yim and the [two] horns גְּבֹה֗וֹת <WH1364> ge-vo-Hot, [were] high וְהָאַחַת֙ <WH259> ve-ha-'a-Chat but one גְּבֹהָ֣ה <WH1364> ge-vo-Hah [was] higher מִן־ <WH4480> min- than הַשֵּׁנִ֔ית <WH8145> hash-she-Nit, than the other וְהַ֨גְּבֹהָ֔ה <WH1364> ve-Hag-ge-vo-Hah, and the higher עֹלָ֖ה <WH5927> 'o-Lah came up בָּאַחֲרֹנָֽה׃ <WH314> ba-'a-cha-ro-Nah. last

רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I saw אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאַ֡יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil the ram מְנַגֵּחַ֩ <WH5055> me-nag-ge-aCh pushing יָ֨מָּה <WH3220> Yam-mah westward וְצָפ֜וֹנָה <WH6828> ve-tza-Fo-nah and northward וָנֶ֗גְבָּה <WH5045> va-Neg-bah, and southward וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol no חַיּוֹת֙ <WH2416> chai-yOt so that no beasts לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- and no יַֽעַמְד֣וּ <WH5975> ya-'am-Du might stand לְפָנָ֔יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav, before וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein nor מַצִּ֖יל <WH5337> matz-Tzil him neither [was there any] that could deliver מִיָּד֑וֹ <WH3027> mi-ya-Do; out of his hand וְעָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah but he did כִרְצֹנ֖וֹ <WH7522> chir-tzo-No according to his will וְהִגְדִּֽיל׃ <WH1431> ve-hig-Dil. and became great

וַאֲנִ֣י׀ <WH589> va-'a-Ni I הָיִ֣יתִי <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti become מֵבִ֗ין <WH995> me-Vin, And as I was considering וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh behold צְפִיר־ <WH6842> tze-fir- goat הָֽעִזִּים֙ <WH5795> ha-'iz-Zim behold an he בָּ֤א <WH935> ba came מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַֽמַּעֲרָב֙ <WH4628> ham-ma-'a-Rav from the west עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> pe-Nei on the face כָל־ <WH3605> chol of the whole הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, of the whole earth וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> ve-'Ein without נוֹגֵ֖עַ <WH5060> no-Ge-a' and touched בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz; not the ground וְהַ֨צָּפִ֔יר <WH6842> ve-Hatz-tza-Fir, and the goat קֶ֥רֶן <WH7161> Ke-ren horn חָז֖וּת <WH2380> cha-Zut [had] a notable בֵּ֥ין <WH996> bein between עֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> 'ei-Nav. between his eyes

וַיָּבֹ֗א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo, And he came עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- up הָאַ֙יִל֙ <WH352> ha-'A-yil to the ram בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> Ba-'al that had הַקְּרָנַ֔יִם <WH7161> hak-ke-ra-Na-yim, [two] horns אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which רָאִ֔יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti, which I had seen עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> 'o-Med standing לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> lif-Nei before הָאֻבָ֑ל <WH180> ha-'u-Val; the river וַיָּ֥רָץ <WH7323> vai-Ya-rotz and ran אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about בַּחֲמַ֥ת <WH2534> ba-cha-Mat unto him in the fury כֹּחֽוֹ׃ <WH3581> ko-Cho. of his power

וּרְאִיתִ֞יו <WH7200> u-re-'i-Tiv And I saw מַגִּ֣יעַ׀ <WH5060> mag-Gi-a' him come אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel close unto הָאַ֗יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil, the ram וַיִּתְמַרְמַ֤ר <WH4843> vai-yit-mar-Mar and he was moved with choler אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> 'e-Lav at וַיַּ֣ךְ <WH5221> vai-Yach against him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil, the ram וַיְשַׁבֵּר֙ <WH7665> vay-shab-Ber and brake אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> she-Tei his two קְרָנָ֔יו <WH7161> ke-ra-Nav, horns וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah had כֹ֛חַ <WH3581> Cho-ach and there was no power בָּאַ֖יִל <WH352> ba-'A-yil in the ram לַעֲמֹ֣ד <WH5975> la-'a-Mod to stand לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> le-fa-Nav; before וַיַּשְׁלִיכֵ֤הוּ <WH7993> vai-yash-li-Che-hu him but he cast him down אַ֙רְצָה֙ <WH776> 'ar-tzah to the ground וַֽיִּרְמְסֵ֔הוּ <WH7429> vai-yir-me-Se-hu, and stamped וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- none הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ha-Yah had מַצִּ֛יל <WH5337> matz-Tzil upon him and there was none that could deliver לָאַ֖יִל <WH352> la-'A-yil the ram מִיָּדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> mi-ya-Do. out of his hand

וּצְפִ֥יר <WH6842> u-tze-Fir Therefore the he הָעִזִּ֖ים <WH5795> ha-'iz-Zim goat הִגְדִּ֣יל <WH1431> hig-Dil great עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; waxed very וּכְעָצְמ֗וֹ <WH6105> u-che-'a-tze-Mo, and when he was strong נִשְׁבְּרָה֙ <WH7665> nish-be-Rah was broken הַקֶּ֣רֶן <WH7161> hak-Ke-ren horn הַגְּדוֹלָ֔ה <WH1419> hag-ge-do-Lah, the great וַֽתַּעֲלֶ֜נָה <WH5927> vat-ta-'a-Le-nah and for it came up חָז֤וּת <WH2380> cha-Zut notable ones אַרְבַּע֙ <WH702> 'ar-Ba' four תַּחְתֶּ֔יהָ <WH8478> tach-Tei-ha, place לְאַרְבַּ֖ע <WH702> le-'ar-Ba' toward the four רוּח֥וֹת <WH7307> ru-Chot winds הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. of heaven

וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- Out הָאַחַ֣ת <WH259> ha-'a-Chat And out of one מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> me-Hem, of them יָצָ֥א <WH3318> ya-Tza of them came forth קֶֽרֶן־ <WH7161> ke-ren- horn אַחַ֖ת <WH259> 'a-Chat of one מִצְּעִירָ֑ה <WH4704> mitz-tze-'i-Rah; a little וַתִּגְדַּל־ <WH1431> vat-tig-dal- great יֶ֛תֶר <WH3499> Ye-ter which waxed exceeding אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- toward הַנֶּ֥גֶב <WH5045> han-Ne-gev toward the south וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- toward הַמִּזְרָ֖ח <WH4217> ham-miz-Rach and toward the east וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and toward הַצֶּֽבִי׃ <WH6643> hatz-Tze-vi. and toward the pleasant

וַתִּגְדַּ֖ל <WH1431> vat-tig-Dal And it waxed great עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- up צְבָ֣א <WH6635> tze-Va [even] to the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven וַתַּפֵּ֥ל <WH5307> vat-tap-Pel and it cast down אַ֛רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah to the ground מִן־ <WH4480> min- some הַצָּבָ֥א <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va [some] of the host וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- and some הַכּוֹכָבִ֖ים <WH3556> hak-ko-cha-Vim and of the stars וַֽתִּרְמְסֵֽם׃ <WH7429> Vat-tir-me-Sem. and stamped

וְעַ֥ד <WH5704> ve-'Ad even שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> sar- [himself] even to the prince הַצָּבָ֖א <WH6635> hatz-tza-Va of the host הִגְדִּ֑יל <WH1431> hig-Dil; Yea he magnified וּמִמֶּ֙נּוּ֙ <WH4480> u-mi-Men-nu at; הֵרִים he-rim כהוּרַ֣ם <WH7311> hu-Ram bring up קהַתָּמִ֔יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid, and by him the daily וְהֻשְׁלַ֖ךְ <WH7993> ve-hush-Lach was cast down מְכ֥וֹן <WH4349> me-Chon and the place מִקְדָּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH4720> mik-da-Sho. of his sanctuary

וְצָבָ֛א <WH6635> ve-tza-Va And an host תִּנָּתֵ֥ן <WH5414> tin-na-Ten was given עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- along הַתָּמִ֖יד <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid [him] against the daily בְּפָ֑שַׁע <WH6588> be-Fa-sha'; [sacrifice] by reason of transgression וְתַשְׁלֵ֤ךְ <WH7993> ve-tash-Lech and it cast down אֱמֶת֙ <WH571> 'e-Met the truth אַ֔רְצָה <WH776> 'Ar-tzah, to the ground וְעָשְׂתָ֖ה <WH6213> ve-'a-se-Tah and it practised וְהִצְלִֽיחָה׃ <WH6743> ve-hitz-Li-chah. and prospered

וָאֶשְׁמְעָ֥ה <WH8085> va-'esh-me-'Ah Then I heard אֶֽחָד־ <WH259> 'e-chod- one קָד֖וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh saint מְדַבֵּ֑ר <WH1696> me-dab-Ber; speaking וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> vai-yo-Mer said אֶחָ֨ד <WH259> 'e-Chad and another קָד֜וֹשׁ <WH6918> ka-Doosh saint לַפַּֽלְמוֹנִ֣י <WH6422> lap-pal-mo-Ni unto that certain הַֽמְדַבֵּ֗ר <WH1696> ham-dab-Ber, [saint] which spake עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- against מָתַ֞י <WH4970> ma-Tai How הֶחָז֤וֹן <WH2377> he-cha-Zon How long [shall be] the vision הַתָּמִיד֙ <WH8548> hat-ta-Mid [concerning] the daily וְהַפֶּ֣שַׁע <WH6588> ve-hap-Pe-sha' [sacrifice] and the transgression שֹׁמֵ֔ם <WH8074> sho-Mem, of desolation תֵּ֛ת <WH5414> tet to give וְקֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> ve-Ko-desh both the sanctuary וְצָבָ֖א <WH6635> ve-tza-Va and the host מִרְמָֽס׃ <WH4823> mir-Mas. tread -ing

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, about עַ֚ד <WH5704> 'ad against עֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> 'E-rev evenings בֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> Bo-ker, mornings אַלְפַּ֖יִם <WH505> 'al-Pa-yim unto me Unto two thousand וּשְׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> u-she-Losh and three מֵא֑וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot; hundred וְנִצְדַּ֖ק <WH6663> ve-nitz-Dak be cleansed קֹֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6944> Ko-desh. then shall the sanctuary

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> vay-Hi, become בִּרְאֹתִ֛י <WH7200> bir-'o-Ti had seen אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I דָנִיֵּ֖אל <WH1840> da-ni-Yel And it came to pass when I [even] I Daniel אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הֶחָז֑וֹן <WH2377> he-cha-Zon; the vision וָאֲבַקְשָׁ֣ה <WH1245> va-'a-vak-Shah and sought בִינָ֔ה <WH998> vi-Nah, for the meaning וְהִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> ve-hin-Neh and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> 'o-Med then behold there stood לְנֶגְדִּ֖י <WH5048> le-neg-Di before כְּמַרְאֵה־ <WH4758> ke-mar-'eh- before me as the appearance גָֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> Ga-ver. of a man

וָאֶשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> va-'esh-Ma' And I heard קוֹל־ <WH6963> kol- voice אָדָ֖ם <WH120> 'a-Dam a man's בֵּ֣ין <WH996> bein between אוּלָ֑י <WH195> 'u-Lai; between [the banks of] Ulai וַיִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> vai-yik-Ra which called וַיֹּאמַ֔ר <WH559> vai-yo-Mar, and said גַּבְרִיאֵ֕ל <WH1403> gav-ri-'El Gabriel הָבֵ֥ן <WH995> ha-Ven [man] to understand לְהַלָּ֖ז <WH1975> le-hal-Laz make this אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמַּרְאֶֽה׃ <WH4758> ham-mar-'Eh. the vision

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo So he came אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> 'E-tzel near עָמְדִ֔י <WH5975> 'a-me-Di, abide וּבְבֹא֣וֹ <WH935> u-ve-vo-'O and when he came נִבְעַ֔תִּי <WH1204> niv-'At-ti, I was afraid וָאֶפְּלָ֖ה <WH5307> va-'ep-pe-Lah and fell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on פָּנָ֑י <WH6440> pa-Nai; upon my face וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer but he said אֵלַי֙ <WH413> 'e-Lai about הָבֵ֣ן <WH995> ha-Ven unto me Understand בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- O son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for לְעֶת־ <WH6256> le-'et- for at the time קֵ֥ץ <WH7093> ketz of the end הֶחָזֽוֹן׃ <WH2377> he-cha-Zon. [shall be] the vision

וּבְדַבְּר֣וֹ <WH1696> u-ve-dab-be-Ro Now as he was speaking עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> 'im-Mi, with נִרְדַּ֥מְתִּי <WH7290> nir-Dam-ti with me I was in a deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- with פָּנַ֖י <WH6440> pa-Nai on my face אָ֑רְצָה <WH776> 'A-re-tzah; toward the ground וַיִּ֨גַּע־ <WH5060> vai-Yig-ga'- but he touched בִּ֔י Bi, וַיַּֽעֲמִידֵ֖נִי <WH5975> vai-ya-'a-mi-De-ni me and set עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עָמְדִֽי׃ <WH5975> 'a-me-Di. stand

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> hin-Ni behold מוֹדִֽיעֲךָ֔ <WH3045> mo-di-'a-Cha, Behold I will make thee know אֵ֥ת <WH853> 'et אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- what יִהְיֶ֖ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh will occur בְּאַחֲרִ֣ית <WH319> be-'a-cha-Rit what shall be in the last end הַזָּ֑עַם <WH2195> haz-Za-'am; of the indignation כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki for pertains לְמוֹעֵ֥ד <WH4150> le-mo-'Ed for at the time appointed קֵֽץ׃ <WH7093> Ketz. the end

הָאַ֥יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil The ram אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which רָאִ֖יתָ <WH7200> ra-'I-ta which thou sawest בַּ֣עַל <WH1167> Ba-'al having הַקְּרָנָ֑יִם <WH7161> hak-ke-ra-Na-yim; [two] horns מַלְכֵ֖י <WH4428> mal-Chei [are] the kings מָדַ֥י <WH4074> ma-Dai of Media וּפָרָֽס׃ <WH6539> u-fa-Ras. and Persia
